text: David Bowie Narrates Prokofiev's Peter and the Wolf is the fourteenth studio album by David Bowie. The album was released on May 2, 1978. ==Track listing== # Peter and the Wolf, Op. 67 (Sergei Prokofiev) – 27:08 # Young Person's Guide to the Orchestra, Op. 34 (Benjamin Britten) – 17:09 ==References== Category:1978 albums Category:RCA Records albums Category:David Bowie albums
title: David Bowie Narrates Prokofiev's Peter and the Wolf
